project_name: Video Analytics Solution Proposal for AVA Project - Nas Ltd

slides.title: Video Analytics Solution Proposal for AVA Project - Nas Ltd

content.text: Project: AI-Powered Video Analytics for Safety Compliance and Workforce Monitoring
Project Owner: AVA Project - Nas Ltd
Work Scope: Cloud-based AI system to monitor workplace safety compliance, detect fire and smoke incidents, prevent worker-vehicle collisions, and monitor restricted danger zones in real time.
Number of AI Module per Camera: 3-4 modules per camera

right_column.title: Client Responsibilities
content: Hardware: Camera maintenance and operation (6 IP cameras already installed)

content.text: Total system bandwidth: 72 Mbps (12 Mbps × 6 cameras)
Connectivity Type: IP-based cameras with RTSP support
Power Source: Stable power source (confirmed by client)

milestones.event: | System Integration & Handover / UAT | T2 + 2-4 weeks |

content.purpose: Ensures compliance with safety regulations by identifying workers wearing safety helmets. Detects workers without a safety helmet on the construction site.
content.alert_logic: AI will capture people not wearing a helmet or wearing the helmet, and trigger the real-time alerts.
content.preconditions: Camera must maintain a suitable distance for clear observation of workers, typically between 5 to 10 meters.

content.purpose: Detects workers wearing high-visibility vests. These vests enhance visibility, especially in low-light conditions.
content.alert_logic: Alert will be sent out immediately to remind workers missing a reflective vest. AI identifies missing vests and notifies in real time.
content.preconditions: Camera must maintain a suitable distance for clear observation of workers, typically between 5 to 10 meters.

content.purpose: Detects situations where fire or smoke is present in the monitored area, ensuring early intervention and safety compliance.
content.alert_logic: Automatically triggers an alert when fire or smoke is detected in the area, enabling quick response and mitigation actions.
content.preconditions: Camera must directly face the work area, allowing a clear view of the work area – the area prone to fire hazards.

content.purpose: Detects and identifies potential or actual workers dangerously close to moving machinery within 100 cm (3 feet) and between workers.
content.alert_logic: Automatically triggers an alert when a near-miss from 100cm or a collision occurs.
content.preconditions: Requires providing images of different vehicle types for model training.
content.data_requirements: Request: Provide images of different vehicle types for model training.

content.purpose: Alerts whenever workers enter/approach the switchgear panel (crossing the restricted red line).
content.alert_logic: Alarms trigger if someone enters without authorization.
content.preconditions: Cameras cover perimeter areas, continuously monitoring for intruders.

content.text: Dashboard: Real-time alerts displayed on web-based dashboard
Email: Automated email notifications to designated operators
Telegram: Telegram bot notifications for on-site alerts
Real-time alert triggers for all detection events
Alert escalation rules based on severity
Charts and graphs of detection frequencies
Filterable by module, time range, and severity
Single centralized dashboard for all 6 cameras
Daily summary reports sent to stakeholders
Export capabilities: Excel, PDF, CSV formats
Timestamp filtering and date range selection
Total number of alerts per module
